## DataStore.findCredentialsByFields() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

        iss?: string[];
        sub?: string[];
        claim_type: string;
    }): Promise<{
        rowId: string;
        hash: string;
        iss: {
            did: string;
        };
        sub: {
            did: string;
        };
        jwt: string;
        nbf: number;
        exp: number;
    }[]>;
```
